output.sentences: Today the class of 2018 graduates highschool.
Each student walked slowly to the front while their names was announced.
It was clear that the students were so happy to be receiving their diplopas.
All of the parents were so proud of thier graduating students.
Each student applauded and congradulated each other at the end of the ceremony.
